      • isEndpointConnected

        public void isEndpointConnected(Endpoint p,
                       Reply l)
        Send a Paths.SERVER_VALIDATE_OK to Wowza and listen for the response. The response will be delivered to the PublisherService

        Paths.START_PUBLISHER_STREAMING_SESSION if the streaming session is accepted.

        Paths.FAILED_PUBLISHER_STREAMING_SESSION if the streaming session is not accepted, for whatever reason.
        Parameters:
        p -
        l -

      • obfuscate

        public void obfuscate(StreamingSession session,
             Reply reply)
        Obfuscate SubscriberEndpoint that are not allowed to participate to a streaming session. This method will send an Envelope to the targeted remote Wowza endpoint with a list of SubscriberEndpoint 's uuid that must be obfuscated.
        Parameters:
        session - the current StreamingSession
        reply - a Reply in case a failure occurs. If the operation works, an I/O events will be delivered and no Reply.ok(Object) will be called.

      • deobfuscate

        public void deobfuscate(StreamingSession session,
               Reply reply)
        The Action completed, send a message to the remote Wowza with a list of SubscriberEndpoint that can now be re-added to a streaming session. If the operation works, an I/O events will be delivered and no Reply.ok(Object) will be called.
        Parameters:
        session - StreamingSession
        reply - a Reply in case a failure occurs.
